mapper.select: SELECT chat_name, chat_image, chat_no FROM ( SELECT chat_name, chat_image, chat_no, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY chat_no DESC) AS rn FROM chat WHERE chat_search_allow = 'Y' AND chat_type = 'O3' AND LOWER(chat_name) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{search} || '%') ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT chat_name, chat_image, chat_no, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY chat_no DESC) AS rn FROM chat WHERE chat_search_allow = 'Y' AND chat_type = 'O3' AND LOWER(chat_name) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{search} || '%') )
